    Interface for all vocabularies. Associates human redable worlds with . Do not using Java MessageBundles to improve visibility. TODO Replace with enums

        Returns:
        e.g "and" or "und" in some languages (e.g. polish) returns " " as linker

      • getHundred

        java.lang.String getHundred(java.lang.Integer vartiant)
        Gets hundert
        Parameters:
        vartiant - variantValue variantValue only for language with different variants e.g (in polish 1000 results with: jeden tysiac but 2000 results with: dwa tysiace. If null return default variant
        Returns:
        @return e.g "and" or "und"

      • getScaleNumbers

        java.lang.String getScaleNumbers(int value,
                               java.lang.Integer variantValue)
        Parameters:
        value - input value e.g. for thousand use 1, for million use 2
        variantValue - variantValue only for language with different variants e.g (in polish 1000 results with: jeden tysiac but 2000 results with: dwa tysiace. If null return default variant.
        Returns:
        string representation of value
